props.description: feedback projection on neck and shoulders, slowed 3x

props.value: luminous saturation is complete on upper body with chroma bands encircling various reflective foci e.g. clavicle and bosom
stepwise exaggeration bias renders spectral bands behind the subject, a by-product of the exo-reacto documentation technique

props.description: feedback projection on lower back, slowed 3x

props.value: blossoming rainbow strands are tightly wound but so lacking in contrast that edge condition status is never fully established
crevasse expression is non-turing as evidenced by the degree of chromatic evolution which proceeds in multiple directions

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure, slowed 2x

props.value: hyper-saturated colorforms swirl and play on the performer's derma, apparently ambivalent to the overall reflective context
lineaments are strictly morphogenic but color-generative at inception and cleared ironically by the same powerful luminance
note the turbulent construction of graphemes under non-variant equipment settings that appear to expand and contract at will

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure, slowed 2x

props.value: spontaneous chromagenenic stria emerge from lemony pastels, slowly orienting away from ambulatory vectors in bulbous segments
labyrinthine shadow tunnels continually open and shut passages to adjacent paths as if attempting to fool luminous minotaurs

props.description: feedback projection on figure, slowed 2x

props.value: multiple coincident strial patterns evolve and decay in both synchrony and conflict with ambulatory colorfield dynamorphisms
spectral consistency is maintained in the performer's profile which wards off waves of color like a steeply banked shoreline
radical intersections of strial forms occur in the iliopsoas region which exhibits extraordinary resonant contra-ambulation

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure, slowed 2x

props.value: chromagenic bifurcating stria are radiantly incepted then trans-oriented into shadow in a classic case of the escher effect
mutations of pure color to graphemes are generated by subtle reflective disturbances and are muted by pastels to the right
morphological effects cause distortions of lines beneath the sitter's ribcage, as if tugged only by the gravity of darkness

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure, slowed 2x

props.value: feathered strands of light shepherding pure hue graphemes that effortlessly slide into an aqua-teal sea of femoral appendage
neck and knee are anti-reactive due to resonance within their respective boundary conditions but hyperluminosity is a bonus
facial stria are morphogenic but chroma-friendly and curiously insensitive to the potential inflection points of the sclera

props.description: feedback projection on head, slowed 3x

props.value: cranial inflection point dancing like a flame before sprinting off laterally or making a chromatic pinwheel for good measure
pronounced exaggeration bias is evidenced by the outsized step-silhouette and the graphical tendency to disregard morphology
static swooshes of color hold for a time on her jowls, tempted to acquiesce to magenta but sustainable as a partial cinture

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure, slowed 2x

props.value: step-repeats in magenta and vermillion start at the jaw and descend the neck in an arc without bias centered well offscreen
wormholes of shadow slowly wend upon her furthest deltoid and bosom, sometimes adopting variant bifurcation routes as they go

props.description: feedback projection on posterior, slowed 3x

props.value: free-form, non-repeating symmetron is stasis intermittent and nearly isomorphic with the occasional flare-up on its perimeter
vertical banding is an artifact of digital sensor and projection technology and not a failing of the documentation camera
diagonal page-flipping is evident even when the entities are clearly experiencing unique eruption syndromes during expansion

props.description: feedback projection on standing figure, slowed 4x

props.value: macro-striation is chromagenic and not a byproduct of the tarpaulin backdrop which, while low in reflectivity, is very shiny

props.description: feedback projection on back, slowed 3x

props.value: hypersaturated symmetric colorfield is influenced by brawn and bone at inflection points but is wayward in albedo troughs
dermatological perfections are mildly highlighted in reflection, but please do note the apparent side-to-side match is a ruse
cycle rate is tech-induced perhaps resonating with pneumatic motion as the upper thorax expands and contracts in respiration

props.description: feedback projection on seated figure, slowed 3x

props.value: the work of sculpture is featured without attribution, so that multiple cheap imitations may be hocked in centuries to come
luminous borealis patterns float behind the subject while skinny threads of corona dance upon her arm and shoulder in relief
momentary colorfield stasis on dermatological field is anatomically specific but the blending of pastels is highly nuanced

props.description: feedback projection on face, slowed 2x

props.value: video smokey eye plumage projected by ocular follicle extensions and languid batting of lid in a chromastatic field of bile

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure, slowed 2x

props.value: strial murmuration is periodic in the foreground, splayed out in deposits by the subject's depilated and albedo-rich cranium
angelic wingtips flutter on a static colorfield, bounded by tropically reactive climates of the ribcage and shoulder blades

props.description: feedback projection on figure, slowed 2x

props.value: both angular and contraction bias exhibited as optical reactants swirl and settle onto lemony dynamorphs in the lumbar region
luminous spectral ribbons are shorn in loops about a collapsing center, and at times pinwheel at their tips like dust devils
rumpled bedding envies the step pattern she studies as shadows blend with a steady stream of reactants grazing her perimeter

props.description: feedback projection on standing figure

props.value: colorforms vault through protostria as if mocking their struggle to transcend into morphemes worthy of lengthy description
languid ambulatory hue cyclists are interlopers to the regions of classical reflectiveness that pastel washes her dermascape

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure, slowed 2x

props.value: shadowy tendrils ascend from areola with laminar ease while spawning stria combat the opposing influence of inflection round
morphogenic striation ambulates expansively due to lower ambient light and horizontal parallax effects upon the upper limb

props.description: feedback projection on head and back

props.value: hyperscalar silhouettes in step-repeat are not evidence of expansion bias but rather the proximity of light source to subject
structured bands of color are generally bifold in expression though singleton shafts appear along her spinal cord mid-field
cranial reactivity is optimal when totally shorn as seen when a lone inflection point captures then juggles field anomalies

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure

props.value: dual reaction cores intersect to hyper-illuminate her sinister flank as the vertical line of symmetry forms an obstruction
oscillating spectral bands traverse her shoulder and descend abdominally, unaffected by adjacent areas of magenta and lime
strial hatching is counter-morphological and chromagenic with a tendency to transform shadow on her jowl to a ruddy isomorph

props.description: feedback projection on standing figure, slowed 3x

props.value: as if descending from valhalla to the prisms of elysian fields, her wings lit with slender tips forged from shadow into light
chromastatic dermatological damping is a normalization influence which emphasizes the flanking high-contrast step reflections
spectral fields are stable in horizontal bands until optic turbulence launches a set of chaotic pinwheel spirals into motion

props.description: feedback projection on posing figure, slowed 2x

props.value: expansion bias on facial striation causes dark strands of shadow to rise from her nostrils as well as descend from her lips
note the stepwise expression of a dark pectoral perfection that is muted at every cycle until consumed by color sans-reacto
gangs of strial threads do shepherd colorforms of the performer's thorax but are independent of spectral banding tendencies

props.description: feedback projection on face, slowed 2x

props.value: locks of shadow spawned by clockwise bias arc along the performer's temple to the crook of her mouth as if by a gentle breeze
ocular crows feet show stability even under the duress of eyelid motion and potential influence of sclera inflection points
five o'clock shadow is accurate at least twice a day for the avid light whisperer, sustained in this case by romanesque bangs
